mapper.select: select * from ice_data_model where code = #{modelCode} and status != 0
select * from ice_data_model where id = #{id} and status != 0
mapper.insert: insert into ice_data_model (app_key, code, name, description, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{appKey}, #{code}, #{name}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY update status=#{status},name=#{name}, description=#{description},update_time = now()
